name: Stormtrooper Garrison
Lore: 'The Imperial Navy''s ruthless shock troops. The distinctive white armor of the stormtrooper is recognized throughout the galaxy as a feared occupational force.',
Text: 'Imperial leaders present may not be targeted by weapons. While with an Imperial leader, adds one battle destiny. While at an opponent''s site, Force drain +1 here (or +2 if also a Rebel Base). End of your turn: Use 1 Force to maintain OR Lose 1 Force to place in Used Pile OR Place out of play.',
